entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
